By Deadbuffalo on Monday, February 3, 2003 - 01:46 pm:

The X-port software is compatible with the Sharkport. I have been using the x-port software since lisa first mentioned it, and have had no problems so far. So i don't see the point in hosting the sharkport software. I guess it is easier than explaining to people that their sharkport is compatible with the x-port software.
